text: You don’t need an ice cream maker for this strawberry-coconut ice cream cake. Whipped cream, coconut milk and a touch of vodka help keep the mixture from forming ice crystals. https://t.co/9AJ8zWMaz7

name: nytimes
text: “We gave up, but her hair didn’t. Strands of beautiful silver hair clung to my clothes, car, sheets. Mocking and reminding me of who I was losing. After many sessions of individual and couples counseling, we re-emerged, together.” — Darrell Hill https://t.co/vZMSZdLbIS

name: nytimes
text: Shakespeare in the Park and other outdoor theater venues are shut. But for performers and directors, open-air memories are as sharp as the bite of a mosquito. https://t.co/nLs6WYNCuz
